'''Cookie Maina''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|A portly woman startles at your approach. As she downswings her meat cleaver, she nearly catches her fingers. Glowering, she more carefully resumes hacking at what looks to be a slab of ribs.}}
Cookie Maina works in the [Fort Deadlight](/fortDeadlight/) dungeons, serving up meals that are served in the [Deadlight Court](/deadlightCourt/).

|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|quests_involved = [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Blow the Man Down](/blowTheManDown/) - Cookie Maina has some stew that can help make for a great party.

[Category:Fort Deadlight characters](/categoryFortDeadlightCharacters/)
